title: Knife, early 20th century
markings: On blade: a W with a line though the middle, symbolizing a W and an A for Auclair & Wilson. On reverse: "DEPOSE."
provenance: Collection part of inventory of the firm Auclair and Wilson in Paris, which closed around 1950.
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. John M. Thompson in memory of Mr. and Mrs. G. Auclair
description: Short, rounded steel blade with fluted join. Ebony handle with squared sides gently swells towards center.

tombstone.epitaph: Knife, early 20th century.steel, ebony. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. John M. Thompson in memory of Mr. and Mrs. G. Auclair. 1990-67-15.
